text:
Company: Patel Inc

Job Title: Senior Sales Staff/Fit Specialist

About Us:
Patel Inc is a leading retailer of athletic wear and equipment, dedicated to providing high-quality products and exceptional customer service.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced and skilled Senior Sales Staff/Fit Specialist to join our team. As a Senior Sales Staff/Fit Specialist, you will be responsible for providing expert product knowledge to customers, making recommendations, and ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction. You will work closely with the sales team to achieve sales targets and contribute to the overall success of the store.

Responsibilities:
- Provide exceptional customer service and product knowledge to customers
- Conduct footwear fittings and gait analyses to recommend suitable products
- Work closely with the sales team to achieve sales targets and increase revenue
- Maintain a clean and organized store environment
- Participate in visual merchandising and store displays

Qualifications:
- 2+ years of experience in retail sales or a related field
- Advanced knowledge of athletic wear and equipment
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
- Skilled in French (an asset)

Benefits:
- Competitive hourly rate
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Discounts on products and services
- A dynamic and supportive work environment
